name: Electric Avenue
overview:
Electric Avenue, is a Downtown Miami electronics store that caters to residents and upscale tourists. The store was founded in 2010. The retailer quickly established a positive reputation among younger Miami tourists, social media members and club-scene patrons in the trendy area by taking advantage of mobile-friendly and social-sharing advertising techniques.

Electric Avenue offers free shipping in the continental United States, same-day deliver in Miami and Dade County, an easy return policy, and live professional online chats with an electronics expert to troubleshoot problems, make recommendations and solve technical problems. Customers can get answers to their questions by Skype, live chats, emails or telephone.

The retailer carries all types of consumer electronics including cameras, professional photographer equipment, and lighting and studio accessories. Computers, laptops, cellphones, games and consoles make the destination popular among a broad section of consumers. Other electronics products include automotive accessories, portable entertainment devices, and binoculars and telescopes. Electric Avenue also carries televisions, home theater systems and appliances.

Live DJ shows, special user classes, unique partnership events with other Downtown Miami businesses, and fast on-site computer repair service help to attract customers and build loyalty. Electric Avenue offers free in-store camera cleaning to encourage amateur and professional photographers to brave traffic congestion and limited parking to visit the location. Yelp.com reviews attest to consumer enthusiasm for the store but equal unhappiness over the parking situation. Customers complain about the company’s suspension of valet parking and the trouble they have finding parking, especially on weekends when many of the special store events take place.

Miami, which has established a reputation as a great melting pot and tourist destination, has a strong need for bilingual sales associates, and Electric Avenue staff communicate in English, Spanish, Japanese, Portuguese and American Sign Language. Customers can find about Electric Avenue events through its Calendar of Events listing
